enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: No Serial Engine, always use parallel signaling

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Store device transmit contexts in the TX FIFO

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Store device transmit contexts in a register file

register.name: GPTIMER0LD
register.description: General Purpose Timer n Load Register

field.name: GPTLD
field.description: Specifies the value to be loaded into the countdown timer on a reset

register.name: GPTIMER0CTL
register.description: General Purpose Timer n Control Register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b001
enumeratedValue.description: INCR4, non-multiple transfers of INCR4 is decomposed into singles

enumeratedValue.name: 0b010
enumeratedValue.description: INCR8, non-multiple transfers of INCR8, is decomposed into INCR4 or singles

enumeratedValue.name: 0b011
enumeratedValue.description: INCR16, non-multiple transfers of INCR16, is decomposed into INCR8, INCR4 or singles

enumeratedValue.name: 0b101
enumeratedValue.description: INCR4, non-multiple transfers of INCR4 is decomposed into smaller unspecified length bursts

enumeratedValue.name: 0b110
enumeratedValue.description: INCR8, non-multiple transfers of INCR8 is decomposed into smaller unspecified length bursts

enumeratedValue.name: 0b111
enumeratedValue.description: INCR16, non-multiple transfers of INCR16 is decomposed into smaller unspecified length bursts

register.name: HCIVERSION
register.description: Host Controller Interface Version and Capability Registers Length Register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The port status and control registers include a R/W field for controlling the state of the port indicator

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The value of the least significant 3 bits indicates the number of microframes a host controller can hold a set of isochronous data structures (one or more) before flushing the state

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: When FS2 = 0, the size is 1024 elements (4096 bytes). When FS2 = 1, the size is 64 elements (256 bytes)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: When FS2 = 0, the size is 512 elements (2048 bytes). When FS2 = 1, the size is 32 elements (128 bytes)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: When FS2 = 0, the size is 256 elements (1024 bytes). When FS2 = 1, the size is 16 elements (64 bytes)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: When FS2 = 0, the size is 128 elements (512 bytes). When FS2 = 1, the size is 8 elements (32 bytes)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Use the PERIODICLISTBASE register to access the periodic schedule

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Use the ASYNCLISTADDR register to access asynchronous schedule

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When this bit is written to a 1 at the same time or before USBADR is written, the write to the USBADR field is staged and held in a hidden register. After an IN occurs on endpoint 0 and is ACKed, USBADR is loaded from the holding register

register.name: PERIODICLISTBASE
register.description: Periodic Frame List Base Address Register

register.name: BURSTSIZE
register.description: Master Interface Data Burst Size Register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No device present (host mode) or attached (device mode)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Device is present (host mode) or attached (device mode)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Allow the port to identify itself as high speed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Force the port to only connect at full speed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enable automatic reset after connect on host port

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The pull-up on DP is not asserted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The pull-up on DP is asserted for data pulsing during SRP

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Disable pull-up. ID input not sampled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enable automatic B-disconnect to A-connect sequence

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: VBus is below A VBus valid threshold

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: VBus is above A VBus valid threshold

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: VBus is below A session valid threshold

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: VBus is above A session valid threshold

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: VBus is below B session valid threshold

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: VBus is above B session valid threshold

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: VBus is above B session end threshold

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: VBus is below B session end threshold

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Little endian. First byte referenced in least significant byte of 32-bit word

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Big endian. First byte referenced in most significant byte of 32-bit word
